name: Simple Mobile Driving Game
description:
A simple mobile driving game that I created while taking the following course:

https://www.udemy.com/course/unity-mobile/learn/lecture/27983242?start=1#overvie...

Gameplay:

Just simply press left or right side of the screen to turn the car. Car automatically accelerates. You can play 5 times consecutively. After that, you need to wait for 1 minute to play again (you will get a notification).
